document_data.mainbody:
Yaelyn Mitraliir was a wood elven blacksmith for hire from the city of Neverwinter, active in the late 15 century DR.
Yaelyn Mitraliir was thought to be different from her wood elven kin because she took on a smithing vocation, but she found a fascination with refining of metals and highlighting its natural beauty. Becoming a virtuoso blacksmith, Yaelyn Mitraliir made a living by doing work for hire in the city of Neverwinter in the late 15 century DR.
